data.name: Global Conflagration
data.detailed_description:
Set in a fictional near future scenario, Europe is torn apart by war once more. Vanguard PMC managed to infiltrate and seize control of Eastern Europe. While on the sidelines European states barely scramble to form a cohesive military union to counter it. Will the newly reformed EDU manage to overcome it’s bureaucratic barriers and pick up the fallen pieces? Or will the newly formed nationalistic and pragmatic Carpathian movement fend of foreign infiltrators and unite eastern Europe under it’s iron fist? Play Global Conflagration to find out.
The game will feature:
  • A campaign that will explore an unexpected military incursion in Europe as well as offline skirmish and multiplayer
  • Traditional base building system
  • Infantry squads
  • A balanced and unique set of land units for each faction
  • Aircrafts and helicopters
  • Deployable measures to support your units

data.short_description: Set in the near future, Global Conflagration is a RTS game that will take the player on a massive European conquest. Build your base, train units, deploy measures and call in airstrikes to destroy your opponent.
